name: Photo! 3D Album Gallery
summary: A PGAL file contains a gallery of pictures created by Photo! 3D Album, a program used to present pictures in a 3D environment such as an art gallery or Egyptian pyramid. It stores JPEG images imported by a user in a 3D gallery environment.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PGAL file open in Photo! 3D Album 1.2
